statements: UPDATE InventoryTracking SET current_quantity = 15, reorder_level = 5 WHERE item_id = 101;

UPDATE InventoryTracking SET current_quantity = current_quantity - 1 WHERE item_id = 101;

UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity = 20 WHERE item_id = 1001;
